betterquesting:10.desc:8:
In order to actually §euse a computer§r, you must §ewrite programs§r. Your first program will be a basic Hello World program. The computers run §eLua code§r.

To start writing a program, you must §ause the "edit" command and then a file name after it§r. Call yours "§7hello.lua§r" if you don’t have any ideas!

After that, §awrite §r"§7print('Hello, world!')§r" and then §apress CTRL+S (Saves the program)§r and then §aCTRL+W to exit out of the edit program§r.

Now to run your program, type in "§7./hello.lua§r" and then press §7ENTER§r.
